mapper.select: select kh.field0002 clientName, khmx.field0127 startTime, khmx.field0128 entTime, enum.SHOWVALUE status from formson_1447 khmx left join formmain_1184 kh on kh.ID = khmx.formmain_id left join dbo.CTP_ENUM_ITEM enum on khmx.field0129 = enum.ID where khmx.field0124 = #{id} order by khmx.field0127 DESC
